no_more_than_one: There should be no more than one of any of:
atleast_one: There should be at least one of:
dependent: If one of the listed elements exists, they should all exist:
sum: The sum of the listed elements should be the given value
date_order: The iso-date attribute of the ``less`` element should be before that of the ``more`` element
regex_matches: The regex should match all of the listed elements
regex_no_matches: The regex should not match any of the listed elements
startswith: The elements should start with the text of the 'start' element
unique: The text of all the listed elements should be unique
